entries.meaning: (UK, Australia, New Zealand, informal) A saveloy.
examples: “Well, I don′t know what you′ll think. I′m only saying this to show what you′ve all done for me, but last Christmas dinner I had cold savs.”
There was silence and then Mervyn added with a break in his voice, “Saveloys. […] ”

adjectives.description: sav (comparative more sav, superlative most sav)

entries.meaning: (UK, slang, informal) Clipping of savage. (unpleasant or unfair).
